name: Ardent Dark Red
description:
Who says NorthStar can't keep it pro? The Ardent boot features a molded rubber sole and all-weather construction to withstand a constant battery from the elements.
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
谁说北极星不能保持专业?厄登靴的特点是模铸橡胶鞋底和全天候结构来承受风雨的侵蚀.
女款目前缺货.
